title: Crashing every game
body:
I've crashed every game I've played (URF, ARAM, Norms) It happens normally around the time minions spawn, I have to completely close client and re-open to reconnect. I've tried repairing my client, still nothing. Help :(
EDIT : Happens on Alpha Client aswell.
"League has stopped working"

replies.body:
We've seen this issue pop up after some recent Windows updates that changed some features inside Windows. These primary features are called the [Windows Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) and the [SmartScreen filter](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/930168). I recommend disabling both of them to ensure they aren't causing this.

Let me know if either resolved this.

Hi, I don't think I disabled them. I went into my graphic card settings and re-enabled optimized settings (somehow got disabled and was using like medium graphics in league compared to very high, on a GTX 1080) and it seemed to fix the problem. If it comes back, I'll make sure to try this though! Thanks for the response!
